title: Rapid Innovation in a Highly Regulated Space - What Can We Learn from COVID-19?
description: The all-star lineup of speakers at the 2-day 13th Annual CEND symposium includes former UC President Janet Napolitano, Nobel Laureate Harold Varmus, and former FDA Commissioner Mark McClellan. This CEND Coronavirus Hackathon includes lectures and workshops to address what we can learn from Covid-19 for pandemic preparedness.[](https://www.cendcoronavirushackathon.com/) CEND is hosting the conference in partnership with the UCB School of Public Health, Goldman School of Public Policy, and CITRIS.
